dct_title_s: Karte von dem Mittaeglichen Meere : zu der allgemeinen Historie der Reise-beschreibungen [map]
dct_description_sm: Nautical chart of South Atlantic Ocean with portions of South America and Southern Africa; relief shown pictorially. In lower right-hand magin: Zusatz zum 1 Bande, 2e. Karte. Probably issued in: Allgemeine Historie der Reisen zu Wasser und Lande ... Leipzig : Bey Arkstee und Merkus, 1747-1774.
dct_subject_sm: Nautical charts—South Atlantic Ocean—Early works to 1800
dcat_theme_sm: Nautical charts—South Atlantic Ocean—Early works to 1800
